QuestData.Title: The Charred Granite of the Dark Portal
QuestData.Description: Kasim wants you to gather granite chips from these chunks of rock around the Dark Portal. I don't know what he'd want rocks for, but I have my suspicions, and they're not pleasant ones.$b$bUse this pick and look for small outcroppings of rock along the edge of the portal's blast radius.
QuestData.RewardText: I hope this is what the gnome wanted.
